-----Original Message-----
From: Zach Heaven [SMTP:zheaven@...]
Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 9:46 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] rumors

From: Zach Heaven <zheaven@...>

Firewater was easy to make, just grabbed the Gnomish
spirits at the brewhouse near the bank, water, and
viola! Now, the question I have is this:

WHERE can I get pie tins? I need them for making the
compass, I have everything else. But, I can't find
PIE tins!!
